reference.title: learningGroupMap
reference.shortdesc: Use a learningGroupMap to create standalone aggregations of learningObjects and learningGroups, as well overviews and summaries, and assessments, according to the needs identified by the learning goals and objectives.

section.title: Description and Semantics
section.p: The learningGroupMap is a map specialization which supports the DITA Learning and Training Map domain. It is used to aggregate learningObjects and learningGroups, together with their supporting files and assessments, into a single standalone map type. Recursion is provided to support complex aggregations of learning content and can be used as necessary to support the creation of complex learning structures, such as learning units, sections, and courses.
